name: goanywhere
label: GoAnywhere
description: GoAnywhere MFT is a secure file transfer solution that organizations use to exchange their data safely. The solution helps organizations automate their data transfers, centralize file transfer activity, monitor file transfers and user access. This connector facilitates automated operation related to File Transfer Summary, Active Sessions Details, and Completed Jobs Summary.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the GoAnywhere server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the username used to access the GoAnywhere server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the password used to access the GoAnywhere server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get File Transfer Summary
operations.description: Retrieves the number of file transfers summary details for a specified service from GoAnywhere based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Module
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere modules that will be included in the file transfer statistics from the following available options:
parameters.name: module
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere modules that will be included in the file transfer statistics from the following available options:

parameters.title: Date Range
parameters.description: (Optional) The scope of the statistics based on date and time from the following available options:
parameters.name: date_range
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The scope of the statistics based on date and time from the following available options:

parameters.title: Group By
parameters.description: (Optional) Determines how the statistics are grouped by from the following available options:
parameters.name: group_by
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Determines how the statistics are grouped by from the following available options:

operations.title: Get Active Sessions Details
operations.description: Retrieves the active session details for each active session from GoAnywhere based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Services
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere services that will be returned from the following available options:
parameters.name: services
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere services that will be returned from the following available options:

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: max_rows
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from GoAnywhere.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from GoAnywhere.

operations.title: Get Completed Jobs Summary
operations.description: Retrieves the number of completed jobs for the specified date range from GoAnywhere based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Date Range
parameters.description: (Optional) The scope of the statistics based on date and time from the following available options:
parameters.name: date_range
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The scope of the statistics based on date and time from the following available options:

parameters.title: Group By
parameters.description: (Optional) Determines how the statistics are grouped by from the following available options:
parameters.name: group_by
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Determines how the statistics are grouped by from the following available options:

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: (Optional) Narrow the results by Job status from the following available options:
parameters.name: status
